name: State Administrative Expenses for Child Nutrition
objective: To provide each State agency with funds for its administrative expenses in supervising and giving technical assistance to local schools, school districts and institutions in their conduct of Child Nutrition Programs. State agencies that administer the distribution of USDA Foods to schools and child or adult care institutions are also provided with State Administrative Expense (SAE) funds.

results.description: Provided $334,827,370 for the administration of Child Nutrition Programs.
Provided $474,230,296 for the administration of Child Nutrition Programs.

authorizations.text: Child Nutrition Act of 1966, as amended, 7, 10. Pub. L. 095, 642. 42 U.S.C. § 1776.

rules_regulations: Program regulations are codified at 7 CFR Part 235.
